comments:
The following is displayed in the log file when opening the help in the 
current version of the Rational Software Modeler product which is built on 
Eclipse.  The problem appears to be in several of the EMF documents.  We are 
using Eclipse 3.0.2.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.help 4 0 Mar 14, 2005 09:14:51.250
!MESSAGE Failed to parse Table of Contents file, URL: 
file:///org.eclipse.emf.doc/toc.xml at line: 21, column: 113.
The reference to entity "version" must end with the ';' delimiter.

Thanks for the detailed bug report... however, this is a duplicate of bug 86190,
and can be resolved by upgrading to the latest EMF 2.0.2 driver (or revising the
XML in the toc.xml files to remove the '&' characters, if you're a keener).

See EMF 2.0.2RC2 build (M200502281726) or newer.

http://download.eclipse.org/tools/emf/scripts/downloads.php#goto2.0.2M

- Nick

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 86190 ***
